com.mumfrey.liteloader.core

Class LiteLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.core.LiteLoader

  • public final class LiteLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    LiteLoader is a simple loader which loads and provides useful callbacks to lightweight mods
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
